column4: i'm trying to look at a website. it tells me i need macromedia flash 8 plugin, but i thought i already had that installed. could someone help me?
are you sure you don't have flash player 7?
as far as i know there is no flash player 8 for linux at the moment
i've got flashplugin-nonfree installed and basically every thing else in apt-get with macromedia in the title
does this mean i can't look at the website in linux? that's all there is to it?
